description.en: A Christmastime mystery unfolds at Miss Heathwood's Boarding School for Girls after Mandie Shaw (Kelly Lynm Washington) investigates strange noises coming from the school's forbidden attic.

In this offbeat comedy, a struggling playwright fakes a suicide attempt to get the attention of her ex-boyfriend, but the stunt results in her moving back to her family home to live with her wacky brother, unreliable mother and a handsome lodger.

In this vivid, intelligent sci-fi action film, a computer hacker discovers that his world is actually a virtual-reality simulation run by malevolent machines, and joins a group of superpowered revolutionaries aiming to tear down the system.
Joaquin Phoenix announces that he's retiring from acting to launch a hip-hop career as his brother-in-law Casey Affleck captures the ensuing media circus on camera in this farce.

credits.name: They Are Going to Kill Us Productions

description.en: Percy feels left out when Thomas begins hanging out with two new fire engines. As a result, he begins spending time with Diesel 10, but wastes little time in coming to Thomas' aid when Thomas gets trapped in Dieselworks.

title.en: Thomas and Friends: Day of the Diesels

description.en: A visionary cyborg combats with a female robot, sent to assassinate a human, who is destined to become the leader of a worldwide resistance movement.
Mater's 'tall tales' involving bullfights, rock concerts, monster truck showdowns, UFOs and drag races!
A mysterious drifter sets two New Orleans street gangs against one another, and he later battles the community's corrupt sheriff in this exhilarating action thriller.
In this exciting crime drama, a camping trip takes a dangerous turn when a family unwittingly drive away with $4 million in cash that a band of criminals will stop at nothing to retrieve.

Powerful and sensitive adaptation of John Boyne's novel about the horrors of the Holocaust, as seen through the naïve eyes of the 8-year-old son of a Nazi commandant who befriends a Jewish boy in a concentration camp.

In this wild action film, Sam (John Cena) feuds with his two half brothers, but the trio must come together in order to stop some brutal bad guys from ripping off the inheritance they are due after their father dies. Directed by Michael Pavone.

In this hilarious prequel to "Despicable Me," a trio of small yellow minions search for a new evil genius to serve. Later, they pledge their loyalty to a supervillainess and her inventor husband as part of a plan to steal the British royal crown.

credits.characterName: Kevin the Minion/Bob the Minion/Stuart the Minion
credits.name: Pierre Coffin

description.en: In this observant comedy inspired by films of the French New Wave, a twentysomething woman deals with romantic troubles, a failed friendship, unemployment and finding an apartment in New York City.
Barney shows how pediatricians, dentists and veterinarians help keep children and animals healthy.

title.en: Barney: Let's Go to the Doctor

description.en: Filmmaker Nina Davenport chronicles her journey to motherhood as a single fortysomething in New York City with help from her friends, including a gay man who becomes her sperm donor, but also while dealing with the death of her mom.

A woman faces a custody battle with her ex-husband, and she tries to keep the dispute a secret from her current spouse. Meanwhile, her current spouse fails to consult with her before inviting his teenage daughter to move in with them.

After his wife is institutionalized, a serial philanderer impulsively hires an eccentric woman to act as a nanny for his five troubled daughters in this endearing comedy-drama. In time, she gives the girls a much-needed confidence boost.

Three goth teens living in West Memphis, Arkansas, are accused of killing several children, but their lawyer soon realises that the case against them is built on circumstantial evidence. Based on a true story.
A young German executive falls for a Brooklyn gal while on a business trip in New York City.

In this riveting fantasy adventure, two siblings search for their missing parents after they learn they're descendants of a group of protectors who safeguard special objects, such as a fairy-tale mirror their parents were looking for when they vanished.

In this terrifying tale of the supernatural, a pastor and his family are beset by evil after moving to a small town that harbors a diabolical secret: it sits upon one of the gates of hell, and the locals are determined to usher in a new age of darkness.

The National Senior Olympics is seen through the eyes of several participants, including a 100-year-old tennis champion, 86-year-old pole vaulter and 65-and-over women's basketball team that's gunning for its sixth gold medal. Drama occurs away from practice and the playing field, too: one athlete's spouse passes away and another competitor is diagnosed with cancer.
A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days.

A lonely writer falls for his computer's operating system in this quirky and endearing romance. Meanwhile, as the perceptive software draws him out of his shell, he struggles with a difficult divorce from his childhood sweetheart.

credits.characterName: New Sweet Boyfriend of Mother Who Dated Pricks
credits.name: Steve Zissis

description.en: This thrilling docudrama depicts the true story of a Coast Guard rescue operation off of Cape Cod during a ferocious storm in 1952. When an oil tanker splits in half, trapping its crew aboard the sinking vessel, four Guardsmen set out to save them.

A prim nurse is awakened to her own capacity for cruelty and mind games after she is the victim of a sexual assault. She then uses her newfound sense of ruthlessness to ensnare her rapist in a revenge scheme.

A thief takes his estranged daughter on the lam when a job goes awry in this intense thriller. As crooks and corrupt cops close in on them, he also takes out a life-insurance policy on himself in an effort to leave something behind for his daughter.

An American mob boss and his family are relocated to France through the Witness Protection Program in this thrilling action comedy, but they soon draw the attention of some dangerous underworld figures who are determined to see them dead.

A compilation of interviews with LGBT leaders in entertainment, business, sports and public service, including actor Neil Patrick Harris, comedian Wanda Sykes, finance expert Suze Orman and New York City politician Christine Quinn.
A woman tortures her cheating lover at his secluded lake house after learning he is having an affair with her best friend.

Unrepentant womanizer Jon earns the nickname "Don Jon" for his ability to charm the ladies, but harbors an emotionally crippling addiction to Internet porn until two different women teach him the true value of intimacy in this poignant comedy-drama.

In this uplifting, feel-good documentary, two ambitious designers create a one-of-a-kind learning opportunity at a small North Carolina school, allowing teens to conceptualize and construct a real building. They overcome criticism from those in the community who are opposed to doing anything radically different, as well as a lack of funding, in order to put their program in place.
A look at individuals who are serving life-without-parole sentences for crimes committed when they were 17 years old or younger.
A profile of Grace Lee Boggs, a Chinese-American philosopher and social activist in Detroit who spent decades into her nineties fighting for civil rights and female equality.

title.en: American Revolutionary: The Evolution of Grace Lee Boggs

description.en: An illuminating and entertaining look at how the little-known musical act the Incredible Bongo Band gave rise to the modern art of sampling and extended dance breaks.

In this riveting sci-fi romance, two passengers aboard a spacecraft traveling to a distant planet are brought out of suspended animation by a technical glitch—90 years before the vessel is due to reach its destination. Together, they must investigate the malfunction that awakened them, which could threaten the safety of the ship.
A woman fakes her death and her daughter's to escape from her abusive husband. Eight years later he learns they are still alive and begins to plot his revenge.

In this steamy adaptation of the wildly successful novel, a college student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past.
A recent divorcée falls for a charming but devious man who schemes to bilk her out of her money.
This intense documentary profiles ER doctors at L.A. County Hospital's trauma bay, which pioneered the concept of emergency medicine.

In this wonderfully surreal comedy-drama, a desperate greeting-card writer gets caught up in a bizarre conspiracy as he tries to create a card for a newly established holiday called "Girlfriend's Day."

This fasinating profile of singer Nina Simone utilizes a wealth of archival footage, concert material and interviews with the performer in order to tell the story of her remarkable career and civil-rights activism.
Conclusion. New students learn the ropes at the Lalaloopsy Academy for Learning Arts as another semester begins.

title.en: Lalaloopsy Girls: Welcome to L.A.L.A. Prep School!

description.en: A botched execution creates a monster who does battle with a town of criminals.
A Los Angeles radio personality is exiled to small-town Colorado for the holiday season and thrown into close quarters with his polar opposite.

This enchanting adventure follows Twilight Sparkle as she is transported to a parallel world, where she becomes a teenage girl suddenly faced with the daunting prospect of surviving high school and finding a stolen crown with magical powers.

Singer-songwriter David Broza heads to East Jerusalem in order to collaborate with Israeli and Palestinian musicians over the span of eight days. Through the sessions, Broza hopes to create a sense of understanding and peace through music.
Curious Ava and her animal pal Lala vist Cloud Land and battle the evil General Tiger.
A skilled medieval warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master.
A high-school prankster finally gets expelled, forcing him to devise a plan with his friends and brother to hide it from his mom.

smartResponse: Hopefully, you can find something to watch from this list.
